thread.title: Watch This Lady Gaga/Rent Medley and Get Hyped for the Super Bowl
thread.title_full: Watch This Lady Gaga/Rent Medley and Get Hyped for the Super Bowl

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Watch This Lady Gaga/Rent Medley and Get Hyped for the Super Bowl
text:
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Are you pumped to watch Lady Gaga at the Super Bowl's half-time show? I REPEAT: Are you pumped to watch Lady Gaga at the Super Bowl's half-time show!?!? If you haven't reached the point of peak freak out, you can now unleash your inner-theater nerd when you watch Lady Gaga merge with Rent in perfect harmony. I can't help it. I love it so much. I might just watch it again and again instead of even tuning into the Super Bowl. Unless, wait, have you heard if Left Shark is gonna be there!? Because if so, I could be convinced.
Follow Laura on Twitter .
